name: Alexie
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
text1: I don't know if yesterday was good... But today is your birthday!!! :D
text2: That's... not bad, I mean, it's easy
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and text me if you liked it (以及你对那封信有什么想法！).
replayText: Or click on the text, if you want to watch it again.
